data.message: Facebook,if we want to verify our page what process we should do?

replies.message: Hi there, Haris. If you're an admin of a local business Page, you may be eligible for a gray verification badge, which you'll see in your Page's settings. Learn more: http://on.fb.me/1mvHoaw. If your Page represents a celebrity, public figure, sports team, media or entertainment, you may be eligible for a blue verification badge. To see if your Page is eligible, please fill out this form: http://on.fb.me/22DJ8PT. Thanks. -Kate
